text: 16.66 Proposals for night-time economy uses should be related in scale and nature to the centre in which they are proposed and its classification as a night-time economy centre in Policy TC1 and in the London Plan. Larger-scale night-time leisure uses, such as nightclubs and larger cinemas would normally be directed to the Canary Wharf Metropolitan Centre and Brick Lane District Centre, while smaller-scale night-time uses such as bars, smaller cinemas, small to medium sized theatres and music venues would be directed to all centres listed in point 2 Part 2 of Policy TC1.
